SUMMARY: NESTED | FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD DETAIL: FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD

cellularAutomata
Class CAPropertyReader

java.lang.Object
  cellularAutomata.CAPropertyReader

public class CAPropertyReader
extends java.lang.Object

Reads properties from a file and stores in a Properties object. The file should have the format key = value. Each key and value should be on separate lines. The value may be any length and have multiple items such as "0 0 1 0". All keys and values are stored as Strings.

Author:
David Bahr
